ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Anyone else a bad fashion statement like me?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes that happens to me as well.  No helm in character selection screen, yay! Poof, helm once I get in game, booo! ... From: Cyr, Thierry
ygData.messageBody:
Yes that happens to me as well. No helm in character selection screen, yay!
Poof, helm once I get in game, booo!

-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Friday, November 03, 2000 9:45 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Anyone else a bad fashion statement like me?


Join the club, i turn into the red eye'd dark elf. And ya a couple patches
ago helms did get messed up or something, maybe it has something to do with
the new helm graphics they have coming out *shrug*. My warrior and my bard
often show up without a helm on character selection screen now...

Minkin

-----Original Message-----
From: Mott, Mike J. [mailto:mike.j.mott@...]
Sent: November 3, 2000 11:31 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Anyone else a bad fashion statement like me?


One thing I have noticed is that when I active my Mask of Deception the
helmet graphic goes away, and when deception fades it is still gone.

That brings up another point....I am REALLY ugly as a delf!


Lago Bardoon of Bertox, 48th Compostion, Defenders of Aleria
